title: LF training partner (Plat +)
body:
Hi, I am an ex-chal support main who feels that my mechanics have disappeared over the last week. I am looking for potentially a group of people to practice mechanics with in custom games. 2v2 bot lane (effective trades/champion spacing), 1v1 solo lane, hook predictions/juking are just a few of the exercises I would like to try. 

If possible I would like this to be a regular thing to keep mechanics fresh. I have done this in the past and have found it incredibly beneficial. 

Add me in game for further info/if you're interested.

IGN: bluz0r

replies.body: pick me pick me! plat adc main
